Package utility

Class ValueHandler

java.lang.Object
utility.ValueHandler
public class ValueHandler extends Object
Contains correction and checking of all values of the collection class.

    • checkValues

      public static boolean checkValues(String[] newValues, String commandName)
      Sequentially performs correction and verification of each newly entered value.
      Parameters:
      newValues - Mutable values in collection class.commandName
      Returns:
      Exit status of all corrections and verifications.
